description: Expansion of eta(q^9)^3 / eta(q^3) in powers of q.
formula: Euler transform of period 9 sequence [ 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, -2, ...]. - _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^4)) where f(u, v, w) = u^2*w - 2*u*w^2 - v^3. - _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^3), A(x^6)) where f(u1, u2, u3, u6) = u1*u3^2 + u1*u6^2 - u1*u3*u6 - u2^2*u3. - _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005a(3*n) = a(3*n + 2) = 0. a(3*n + 1) = A033687(n). a(6*n + 1) = A097195(n). 3*a(n) = A033685(n).Multiplicative with a(3^e) = 0^e, a(p^e) = e+1 if p == 1 (mod 3), a(p^e) = (1+(-1)^e)/2 if p == 2 (mod 3). - _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^3), A(x^6)) where f(u1, u2, u3, u6) = u2*u3^2 + 2*u2*u3*u6 + 4*u2*u6^2 - u1^2*u6. - _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ q QPochhammer[ q^9]^3 / QPochhammer[ q^3], {q, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Feb 22 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A, p, e); if( n<0, 0, A=factor(n); prod(k=1, matsize(A)[1], if( p=A[k,1], e=A[k,2]; if( p!=3, if( p%3==1, e+1, !(e%2))))))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005 */(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( (n<1) || (n%3!=1), 0, n = (n-1)/3; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^3 + A)^3 / eta(x + A), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 25 2005 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
